description: A Polish church pastor has spent two years looking for the bell, which dates back to 1555.
title: Bell taken by Nazis to be returned to Poland
title_page: Bell taken by Nazis to be returned to Poland - BBC News
maintext: After the war, some bells that had not been melted down for their metal content were returned but 1,300 bells that had been seized in eastern territories such as Poland were kept initially in a bell cemetery in Hamburg and photos of them were kept in an archive in Nuremberg.
